data.title: Los Angeles and Southern California Traffic
data.meta_description: Get traffic updates on Los Angeles and Southern California before you head out with ABC7. Stay updated with real-time traffic maps and freeway trip times.
data.text:

Chino residents fed up with big rigs cutting through Chino Avenue

CicLAvia shuts down streets to cars in Hollywood area

Hundreds of boxes of raisins spill onto 2 Freeway after big rig crash

Protesters calling for ceasefire in Gaza briefly shut down SB 405 Fwy

Highland receives $3 million to help improve this major interchange

All lanes reopened on 10 Fwy in West Adams area after 7-vehicle pileup

Metro plan aims to connect the San Fernando Valley with the Westside

NB 15 Freeway reopens between Barstow and Baker after fiery crash

LA Metro light rail line to be extended into San Bernardino County

15, 10, 5 freeways among the deadliest in California, report says

Typo fixed after Pennsylvania officials 'forgot to proofread' new sign

210 Fwy reopens hours after manufactured home slides off big rig

New sign misspelled near site of Philadelphia bridge collapse

Central California's 'The Palm and the Pine' landmark to be torn down
